title: Kevin Hart, Tessica Brown, MTH, Sidepiece Advice and more.
itunes:title: Kevin Hart, Tessica Brown, MTH, Sidepiece Advice and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We are back with unapologetic ignunce. Happy Friday y'all!!! The Chief Love Officer clearly explains the saying "Don't dip your pen in company ink!" to one married man. Dr. O comes to the rescue of Tessica Brown with her hair issue. The Captain of Team Tommy murders another one and it's about Jermaine Jackson's hair. Comedy Roulette gives you the things people would do instead of getting their vaccine shots. Junior is sad to confirm that Deshaun Johnson is leaving Houston. The fellas all talk about how being on stage has changed since COVID-19. Our resident Fools give Valentine's advice for sidepieces because that's what they do. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve encourages us to pick up the phone and stop the BS because tomorrow is not promised. Have a great holiday weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
